properties.activity name: Jamaica and OECS - Non Communicable Disease Management
properties.description: Studies on Non Communicable Diseases in Jamaica and the OECS countries to learn of the country's experience addressing NCDs and provide a situational analysis and policy recommendations (link: http://web.worldbank.org/WBSITE/EXTERNAL/COUNTRIES/LACEXT/0,,contentMDK:23049218~pagePK:146736~piPK:146830~theSitePK:258554,00.html)

properties.activity name: Assessment of Hospital Management Constraints in Argentina
properties.description: Economic and Sector Work to assist the MOH to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the public perinatal health networksin reducing maternal and child mortality.

properties.activity name: Health Sector Study
properties.description: Economic and Sector Work to propose policy options to better allocate the resources, develop a governance system for the benefit plan and a system to determine prices.

properties.activity name: AR-HRITF Impact Evaluation Plan Nacer
properties.description: Technical assistance to conduct an impact evaluation of the Plan Nacer Results-Based Financing scheme supported by the Health Results and Innovation Trust Fund (HRITF)

properties.activity name: Universal Health Coverage in Latin America and the Caribbean
properties.description: Regional Study outlining how countries in the region have defined universal coverage in practice through country case studies describing programs that have played a key role in expanding health coverage for the poor.

properties.activity name: BR-Assessment of Health System Performance
properties.description: The objective of this grant would be to identify priority areas of health sector reform through an assessment of the performance of the health system in Brazil. In particular, it aims at (i) assessing the quality, efficiency and sustainability of health expenditures in Brazil, including the design and effectiveness of the mechanisms that are in place to insure accountability of public and private expenditures at the three levels of Government (federal, state and municipal).

properties.activity name: BR-S-S Partnership CPLP
properties.description: The goal of the grant is the promoting of systematic cooperation through the establishment of Lusophone health networks and the exchange of information and knowledge among health systems in Lusophone countries, as well as to contribute in the strengthening of health systems in Lusophone countries.

properties.activity name: 6C-Innovative work in HD
properties.description: This activity includes a regional report and a series of "NCDs at a Glance", small booklets with the NCD situation in each country. It also include a Toolkit for TTL on extension of coverage of services which offers operational support to TTLs working on similar issues.

properties.activity name: Reproductive Health among the Youth in Central America: adding a Human Right Perspective
properties.description: The Grant would help to introduce a human rights approach to Bank activities by: (i) evaluating the linkages between reproductive health rights (RHR) and economic development among the youth, in order to strengthen the multi-sectoral design of Bank interventions; (ii) assessing the operational implications of a human rights approach to reproductive health service delivery to address issues like affordability, sustainability, and universality, in a context of limited fiscal resources; (iii) systematizing and disseminating the results of (i) and (ii) to support regional multi-sectoral policy dialogue on reproductive health rights.

properties.activity name: Building the Future: mid and long term vision for the Paraguay Health Sector Development
properties.description: The proposed study aims to support the Government of Paraguay in analyzing main determinants of health conditions and contribute through a process of cooperation and technical assistance in the formulation of a set of strategic guidelines aimed at strengthening the current health of the MOPH&SW strategy.
